Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authority of the county of Madison to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authority of the county of Madison to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes for two years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authority of the county of Madison to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use taxes
